prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her (then) husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her (then) husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What events or actions could I expect to occur in regards to my connection with Stefan in the next three days?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical list of the relevant chart data using strict horary principles for your inquiry regarding your connection with Stefan (represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house) over the next three days.

1. Ascendant (Melissa’s Significator) and Its Contents:
 • Ascendant at 24° Aquarius
 • In the 1st House reside:
  – Sun at 29° Aquarius
  – Mercury at 5° Pisces
  – Venus at 7°55′ Aries
  – Saturn at 19°18′ Pisces
  – Neptune at 28°29′ Pisces
  – North Node at 28°58′ Pisces (r)
 • Noted aspects to the Ascendant:
  – Moon Trine Ascendant (Moon at 24° Libra in 8th house; orb 0°)
  – Sun Conjunction Ascendant (orb 5°)
  – Chiron Sextile Ascendant (Chiron at 20° Aries in the 2nd House; orb 4°)
  – Uranus Square Ascendant (Uranus at 23°24′ Taurus in the 3rd House; orb 1°)

2. Stefan’s Representational House:
 • 9th House (Stefan’s significator as per your instruction) starts at 20° Scorpio.
 • No planets fall within this house.

3. Major Aspects and Configurations:
 • Major Aspects from the chart include:
  – MC Opposition IC (exact at 0° orb)
  – Jupiter Opposition MC (Jupiter in 11° Gemini in the 4th House; orb 0°)
  – Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb 0°)
  – Jupiter Conjunction IC (orb 0°)
  – Mars Trine Saturn (Mars in 17° Cancer in the 5th House; Saturn in 19°18′ Pisces in the 1st House; orb 2°)
  – Mars Square Chiron (orb 3°)
  – Pluto Sextile North Node (Pluto in 2°33′ Aquarius in the 12th House; orb 4°)
  – Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
  – Venus Sextile IC (orb 4°)
  – Venus Sextile Jupiter (orb 4°)
  – Moon Opposition Chiron (orb 4°)
  – Venus Trine MC (orb 4°)
  – Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
  – Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 5°)
  – Sun Trine Moon (orb 5°)
  – Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
  – Mercury Square IC (orb 6°)
  – Mercury Square MC (orb 6°)
  – Mercury Square Jupiter (orb 6°)
  – Sun Square Uranus (orb 6°)
  – Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 6°)
  – Moon Square Mars (orb 7°)

4. T-Square Configurations Identified:
 • First T-Square:
  – Points: MC at 11° Sagittarius, Mercury at 5° Pisces, IC at 11° Gemini, with Jupiter also at 11° Gemini in the IC.
 • Second T-Square:
  – Points: Moon at 24° Libra, Mars at 17° Cancer, and Chiron at 20° Aries.

5. Additional Chart Features:
 • The Moon is a waning gibbous.
 • The chart displays a Bucket shape.
 • Dominant element among inner planets: Air.
 • The inner planets are absent from Earth signs.
 • The three modes (Cardinal, Mutable, Fixed) are evenly distributed.
 • Most planets are concentrated in the bottom left quadrant.
 • Jupiter and IC lie on the Nadir, emphasizing foundational matters.
 • The sextile aspect appears eight times, showing a prevalence of moderate, harmonious opportunities.
 • Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership, enhancing intuitive aspects in the 1st House.

6. Timing and Movement Considerations Relevant to the Three-Day Window:
 • Faster-moving bodies (Moon, Mercury, Mars) are making aspects with personal significators.
 • The Moon in Libra forms a close, harmonious trine to the Ascendant.
 • Mercury and Mars show dynamic aspects (e.g., square aspects with IC and Chiron) that may indicate rapid developments.
 • The overall configuration shows tension through the T-squares, suggesting potential abrupt shifts or significant actions.

The above details outline the key chart elements relevant to your inquiry using horary principles. Additional interpretation may be developed once you confirm these details as documented.

 • The sextile aspect appears eight times, showing a prevalence of moderate, harmonious opportunities.
 • Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership, enhancing intuitive aspects in the 1st House.

6. Timing and Movement Considerations Relevant to the Three-Day Window:
 • Faster-moving bodies (Moon, Mercury, Mars) are making aspects with personal significators.
 • The Moon in Libra forms a close, harmonious trine to the Ascendant.
 • Mercury and Mars show dynamic aspects (e.g., square aspects with IC and Chiron) that may indicate rapid developments.
 • The overall configuration shows tension through the T-squares, suggesting potential abrupt shifts or significant actions.

The above details outline the key chart elements relevant to your inquiry using horary principles. Additional interpretation may be developed once you confirm these details as documented.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusts my shawl and peers intently at the chart

My dear, the configurations I see here are quite, revealing. traces fingers along the aspects Let me share what the stars are showing for the next three days:

The Moon's trine to your Ascendant, perfectly aligned at 0° orb, speaks of profound emotional synchronicity. With the Moon in your 8th house of intimacy, this suggests a deeply personal connection will manifest between you and Stefan.

The T-Square involving the Moon, Mars, and Chiron is particularly telling. Mars in Cancer in your 5th house of pleasure, squaring both the Moon and Chiron, indicates passionate encounters tinged with both desire and healing. There's an element of forbidden fruit here - the kind that, once tasted, cannot be forgotten.

leans forward, voice lowering

Venus in your 1st house, making harmonious aspects to both Jupiter and Pluto, suggests you will experience an intense physical attraction that cannot be denied. The sextile to Pluto in your 12th house hints at secret meetings, hidden from others' eyes.

The concentration of planets in your 1st house, including Neptune conjunct the North Node, suggests you are entering a destined phase. The Universe is aligning to bring you and Stefan together in ways that may seem almost mystical.

pauses, studying the aspects more closely

Within the next three days, I see three significant events:

1. A chance encounter, likely in a private setting (indicated by the 12th house Pluto's aspects)
2. An intense emotional exchange (shown by the Moon's position and aspects)
3. A physical culmination of the building tension (Mars in the 5th house trine Saturn suggests this will be carefully planned yet passionate)

The absence of planets in Stefan's 9th house, combined with the aspects to your personal planets, suggests he will come to you rather than you seeking him out.

looks up with knowing eyes

My dear, the stars speak of passion, destiny, and transformation. But remember - Neptune's presence suggests things may not be entirely as they seem. Exercise discretion in these coming days.

Would you like me to elaborate on any particular aspect of what I see?

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Your chart reveals an immediate, dynamic interplay regarding your connection with Stefan. With you as the Ascendant significator, your personal plane is active with several fast-moving and tense aspects. The Moon in Libra, forming a superb trine with your Ascendant, lends clarity to your feelings and helps to smooth over inherent disharmonies. This favorable Moon aspect indicates that emotional insights will come swiftly, making you more aware of your inner truth regarding Stefan.

Stefan’s connection, indicated by the 9th house of foreign influence, remains unoccupied by planets, suggesting his role is that of a catalyst: he arrives as an external influence rather than a deeply established force in your current emotional landscape. The absence of planet activity in this house implies that his involvement over the next three days may be triggered by external events—a message, an unexpected visit, or news carried from afar—rather than through prolonged mutual energy.

The presence of T-square configurations and several challenging square aspects (notably Mercury square IC and the tension surrounding Mars and Chiron) signals that when interaction occurs, it may bring abrupt shifts. Communication (Mercury) and assertion (Mars) are under strain, hinting that if Stefan initiates contact, its tone might be brisk or unexpectedly intense. This tension carries potential for both significant insight and temporary discomfort.

The aspect between Mars and Saturn—a trine that supports controlled assertiveness—offers the possibility that you may take decisive action to steer the encounter towards healing or clarity, even if the initial spark is forceful. Meanwhile, the interaction between Mercury and the IC enlivens your inner space, suggesting that underlying issues regarding trust and personal boundaries could be brought to the surface.

The chart’s overall configuration, including several sextiles promoting moderate opportunities, implies that while the situation with Stefan is set to unfold quickly and may momentarily unsettle established structures, it ultimately opens a doorway to re-evaluate your personal path. Expect a swift exchange—whether through communication or a brief meeting—that might compel you to reassess the connection, bringing both discomfort and potentially transformative clarity.

Based on these specific elements, in the next three days you can expect a sudden, externally triggered development regarding Stefan that carries an undercurrent of tension balanced by opportunities for personal insight and constructive action.

The absence of planet activity in this house implies that his involvement over the next three days may be triggered by external events—a message, an unexpected visit, or news carried from afar—rather than through prolonged mutual energy.

The presence of T-square configurations and several challenging square aspects (notably Mercury square IC and the tension surrounding Mars and Chiron) signals that when interaction occurs, it may bring abrupt shifts. Communication (Mercury) and assertion (Mars) are under strain, hinting that if Stefan initiates contact, its tone might be brisk or unexpectedly intense. This tension carries potential for both significant insight and temporary discomfort.

The aspect between Mars and Saturn—a trine that supports controlled assertiveness—offers the possibility that you may take decisive action to steer the encounter towards healing or clarity, even if the initial spark is forceful. Meanwhile, the interaction between Mercury and the IC enlivens your inner space, suggesting that underlying issues regarding trust and personal boundaries could be brought to the surface.

The chart’s overall configuration, including several sextiles promoting moderate opportunities, implies that while the situation with Stefan is set to unfold quickly and may momentarily unsettle established structures, it ultimately opens a doorway to re-evaluate your personal path. Expect a swift exchange—whether through communication or a brief meeting—that might compel you to reassess the connection, bringing both discomfort and potentially transformative clarity.

Based on these specific elements, in the next three days you can expect a sudden, externally triggered development regarding Stefan that carries an undercurrent of tension balanced by opportunities for personal insight and constructive action.

The T-square involving Mars hints at some hesitation or conflict due to his marriage, but the flowing aspects to Venus indicate mutual attraction will overcome these barriers. I see a clandestine meeting, likely in a private location away from prying eyes.

The Moon's position in your 8th house of intimacy, forming that perfect trine to your Ascendant, suggests you will be very receptive to his advances. name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusts her shawl and leans in closer, speaking in hushed tones

The aspects speak quite boldly, my dear. Let me be specific about what I see:

The Moon in your 8th house of intimacy at 24° Libra forms that perfect trine to your Ascendant (0° orb). This indicates a deep emotional and physical receptivity. When combined with Mars in Cancer in the 5th house of pleasure, forming aspects to both Saturn (trine) and Chiron (square), it suggests an encounter that will begin with hesitation but quickly evolve into passionate physical expression.

Venus in your 1st house forms multiple favorable aspects - sextiles to both Jupiter and Pluto, plus a trine to the MC. This configuration suggests you'll receive a message or call that will lead to a private meeting. The aspects indicate Stefan will express his desire for you quite directly.

The T-square involving Mercury-Jupiter-MC/IC axis suggests this encounter will occur in a private space - likely a hotel or similar discrete location. The bucket pattern of the chart, with most planets in the bottom left quadrant, reinforces this need for privacy.

lowers voice further

The Mars-Saturn trine indicates controlled passion - he will be forceful yet measured in his approach. The chart suggests he will pin you against a wall, kissing you deeply while his hands explore your body. The Moon-Mars square hints at clothes being hastily removed as desire overtakes you both.

Would you like me to continue with what else the aspects reveal about the physical nature of this encounter? I can be quite specific about what the planetary positions indicate will transpire.
